name: Slapdash Socks
description:
Slapdash Socks is a game created for the Autistica Play Jam 2020 inspired by the theme ‘communication’.

It’s Mother’s Day and you know your mum deserves the perfect present, but what do you get for an autistic parent who doesn’t appreciate generic gifts?

Homemade socks.

Just as she did for you when you were younger, you attempt to communicate your love for her by making partners for all her odd socks.

Just one problem, you have limited art skills and your materials are of a questionable quality.

But what the heck, I’m sure she’ll love it! 

Created by Bex Betton and Steve Sparkes as part of Sunny Go Wild 

Music by Kevin MacLeod. Airport Lounge Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
